Hariz Arthur MaloyTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 23 May 2019The earlier the better. But usually many people start in their late 30s to 40s, its when they start moving their equity investments into fixed income instruments like bonds and annuities.0 comments0
